query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,SUM(CASE WHEN SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(BMT,'') = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MFQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(BMT,'') <> '' OR SEL = 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(BMT,'') <> '' OR SEL = 'S' AND STO = 'STO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ_STO ,SUM(CASE WHEN (SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(BMT,'') <> '' OR SEL = 'S') AND MON <= 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ_3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN (SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(BMT,'') <> '' OR SEL = 'S') AND MON <= 4 AND STO = 'STO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ_3_STO ,SUM(CASE WHEN (SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(BMT,'') <> '' OR SEL = 'S') AND MON >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ_3E ,SUM(CASE WHEN SEL = 'B' AND VALUE(SLA,'N') = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RFQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN SEL = 'B' AND VALUE(SLA,'N') = 'N' AND STO = 'STO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RFQ_STO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST951N WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(YYYYMM,1,4) = #GYEAR# AND YYYYMM <= #YYYYMM# AND GUBUN = 'FAIL'
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET MFQ = B.MFQ ,CFQ = B.CFQ ,CFQ_STO = B.CFQ_STO ,CFQ_3 = B.CFQ_3 ,CFQ_3_STO = B.CFQ_3_STO ,CFQ_3E = B.CFQ_3E ,RFQ = B.RFQ ,RFQ_STO = B.RFQ_STO
